gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 119, Wizards 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Wizards, 119-107. Terry Rozier (27 points, five 3PM, four rebounds) and Bam Adebayo (22 points, 10 rebounds, five assists) led Miami as Jordan Poole totaled 22 points for Washington. Miami improves to 41-33 while Washington goes to 14-61.
